item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 17, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Waymo will bring autonomous vehicles to Tokyo (51 points | 4 comments)
2. New LLM optimization technique slashes memory costs up to 75% (159 points | 54 comments)
3. Settlement from Meta for Australian Users Impacted by Cambridge Analytica (28 points | 8 comments)
4. Xiaomi Home Integration for Home Assistant (431 points | 241 comments)
5. Go Protobuf: The New Opaque API (195 points | 70 comments)
6. Making a watch from scratch (186 points | 34 comments)
7. Lfgss shutting down 16th March 2025 (day before Online Safety Act is enforced) (434 points | 263 comments)
8. 'They must be somewhere': appeal for British oak to recreate Sutton Hoo ship (10 points | 1 comment)
9. Veo 2: Our video generation model (354 points | 172 comments)
10. Why is it so hard to buy things that work well? (2022) (524 points | 438 comments)
11. In Search of a Faster SQLite (224 points | 98 comments)
12. What did Ada Lovelace's program actually do? (2018) (222 points | 76 comments)
13. Ruby Video – On a mission to index all Ruby conferences (171 points | 22 comments)
14. Advent of Code on the Nintendo DS (57 points | 16 comments)
15. Ask HN: SWEs how do you future-proof your career in light of LLMs? (268 points | 555 comments)
16. Forgotten Collection of Charles de Gaulle's Manuscripts Discovered in a Safe (38 points | 1 comment)
17. The Red Beads Experiment (15 points | 3 comments)
18. Modelica (223 points | 71 comments)
19. A new twist: The molecular machines that loop chromosomes also twist DNA (15 points | 4 comments)
20. Popeye and Tintin enter the public domain in 2025 along with Faulkner, Hemingway (250 points | 80 comments)
21. U2's Larry Mullen Jr: my dyscalculia makes 'counting like climbing Everest' (42 points | 28 comments)
22. Using Guile for Emacs (126 points | 42 comments)
23. Mirror bacteria research poses significant risks, scientists warn (148 points | 121 comments)
24. Principles of Educational Programming Language Design (34 points | 24 comments)
25. Alley Cat Remeow Edition (20 points | 8 comments)
26. Backward-incompatible GRUB2 change causing BIOS setup bootloop (75 points | 15 comments)
27. Quick takes on the recent OpenAI public incident write-up (57 points | 15 comments)
28. Our muscles will atrophy as we climb the Kardashev Scale (117 points | 162 comments)
29. Converge (YC S23) is hiring founding engineer #2 ( | hide)
30. Show HN: NCompass Technologies – yet another AI Inference API, but hear us out (24 points | 27 comments)
